acf_add_local_field.description: Add function acf_add_local_field, for when you want to register a standalone ACF field

acf_add_field.description: Adds a generic field function with the properties used for every field, use it to create any ACF field you want

acf_add_page_link_field.description: Adds an ACF Page Link field

acf_add_post_object_field.description: Adds an ACF Post Object field

acf_add_select_field.description: Adds an ACF Select dropdown field
